title: Verizon Wireless Makes Watching NFL Live Games on Phones Free
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
4 Sep 2015 01:42 AM EST 
Verizon Wireless is making live-streaming NFL games available for no extra charge to all smartphone users starting this season — a feature that previously cost $5 for customers on most plans. But the nation’s biggest wireless carrier is not strictly doing it as a favor to sports fans: Verizon Wireless is looking for new ways to encourage customers to use more data, ideally to upgrade to plans with higher usage limits. Now, all smartphone customers can watch every game, in addition to NFL Network, via the redesigned NFL Mobile from Verizon app at no extra charge.
